Welcome to Mindful Reminder! 

 We are excited to introduce our new app that is designed to help you stay mindful and focused on the present moment. Mindful Reminder is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to reduce stress, increase self-awareness, and live a more fulfilling life. 

 One of the key features of our app is the ability to send you reminders at specified intervals throughout the day. These reminders are designed to help you pause, breathe, and focus on the present moment. 

 Mindful Reminder is also customizable, so you can select the frequency of reminders and personalize the app to suit your needs. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced mindfulness practitioner, our app is perfect for you. 

 Thank you for choosing Mindful Reminder. We look forward to helping you stay mindful and focused on the present moment!

Welcome to the Help Page for Mindful Reminder! \n\n Mindful Reminder is a simple and easy-to-use app designed to help you stay mindful and focused on the present moment. Here are some helpful tips on how to use the app:
We hope that you find Mindful Reminder helpful in cultivating mindfulness and positivity in your daily life. Thank you for choosing Mindful Reminder!

• On the main screen, you will see a positive affirmation displayed. If you don't like the current affirmation, you can simply click the "skip" button to display a new one. 
 • The Settings menu can be accessed by clicking on the menu icon in the top right corner of the screen. Here you can turn notifications on and off and set the interval for receiving notifications. 
 • If you would like to turn off notifications altogether, simply toggle the notification button to "off" in the Settings menu. 
 • To set the interval for receiving notifications, click on the "Notification Interval" option in the Settings menu.
